means: 对…使用过度：过于经常使用
装饰：把…的表面加以装饰

sentence.Network_en: He died of a heart attack brought on by overwork.
sentence.Network_cn: 他死于劳累过度引起的心脏病发作。
他因工作过于劳累而病倒了.

sentence.Network_en: The doctor said I must cut overwork out.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生说我必须停止过度劳累.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... overwhelming 压倒性的 overwork 工作过度 owe 借债.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... overstudy n. 用功过度 overwork n. 过度劳累 overact v. 表演过火.
漫画魔鬼辞典-博库网 ... 暴饮暴食( overeat) 过劳( overwork) 绘画( painting).
以o开头的英语英文单词 ... overwhelmingly 以压倒之势地 overwork 过度操劳,过度工作 overwrite 重写.

list.abs: take care not to overwork yourself ., 当心不要过分劳累.
Idleness spawns discontent , whites overwork leads to mental and physical exhaustion ., 懒惰滋生不满 , 而过度任务导致精神和肉体的疲劳.
Idleness spawns discontent , whereas overwork leads to mental and physical exhaustion ., 懒惰滋生不满 , 而过度工作导致精神和身体的疲惫.
additional , the base of computational overwork salary must not be in pay of post due pay under laborer ;另外，计算加班工资的基数不得低于劳动者所在岗位应得的工资报酬；

entry.def: If you overwork or if someone overworks you, you work too hard, and are likely to become very tired or ill.

example.ex: He's overworking and has got a lot on his mind...
example.tran: 他工作太累，而且非常操心。

example.ex: He overworks and underpays the poor clerk whom he employs.
example.tran: 他让那个可怜的职员超负荷工作，却只支付极低的薪水。

means.word_mean: 1. the act working too much or too long;

auth_sentence.content: Mix in the flour taking care not to overwork.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mix in the flour taking care not to overwork.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mix in the flour taking care not to overwork.

auth_sentence.content: The agency attributed his death to physical and mental overwork.
auth_sentence.res_content: The agency attributed his death to physical and mental overwork.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The agency attributed his death to physical and mental overwork.

auth_sentence.content: His health was beginning to weaken under the strain of overwork.
auth_sentence.res_content: His health was beginning to weaken under the strain of overwork.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His health was beginning to weaken under the strain of overwork.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"翻转"; 2. 表示"在……之上"; 3. 表示"过度,过分,超过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+all全部→adj.全部的, 全面的
over过度,过分,超过+correct改正→adj.矫枉过正的
over过度,过分,超过+crowded拥挤的→adj.挤满的
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧张过度的,兴奋过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+wrought=work工作→过度工作
over翻转+night夜, 夜晚→翻过一夜→一夜间→一下子;突然
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的
over翻转+haul拉→拉过去检修
over翻转+throw扔→扔翻了→推翻
over翻转+turn转→翻转
over在……之上+bridge桥→上面的桥→天桥
over在……之上+coat衣服→在衣服上的衣服→外套
over过度,过分,超过+dose剂量→n.药物过量
over过度,过分,超过+production生产→n.生产过度
over过度,过分,超过+study学习→n.用功过度
over过度,过分,超过+work工作→n.过度劳累
over在……之上+lap交叉→[大腿]交叉→重叠
over过度,过分,超过+flow流动→流出来了,溢出
over翻转+take拿,占领→v.袭击,压倒
over在……之上+come来→来到上面→战胜
over在……之上+hang悬挂→v.悬于……之上, 悬垂
over在……之上+look看→在上面看→俯视,引申为疏忽
over在……之上+ride骑→骑在上面→推翻[下面的]
over在……之上+whelm推翻;淹没→翻过来→压倒
over过度,过分,超过+act演出→v.表演过火

sentences.en: I hope you’re not overworking that poor boy.
sentences.cn: 我希望你没有驱使那个可怜的男孩工作过度。
他工作过度, 劳累致死。
他因工作过于劳累而病倒了。
